category.name: First Party Collection/Use
category.description: Privacy practice describing data collection or data use by the company/organization owning the website or mobile app.

attribute.name: Does/Does Not
attribute.description: Use this optional attribute to denote if the policy explicitly states that something is NOT done. Defaults to Does.

value.name: Does
value.description: The first party does engage in the described practice.

value.name: Does Not
value.description: The first party does not engage in the described practice.

attribute.name: Collection Mode
attribute.description: Use this optional attribute to denote if the data collection performed by the first party is implicit (e.g., company collects information without user's explicit awareness) or explicit (e.g., user provides information). Defaults to “not selected.”

value.name: Explicit
value.description: The company/organization collects or uses information that the user explicitly provides, e.g., the user enters information in a web form.

value.name: Implicit
value.description: The company/organization collects or uses information that the user does not explicitly provide, e.g., data is collected or transferred automatically in the background. The user may or may not have given consent to such implicit collection/use.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: It is not specified or unclear whether the information is collected explicitly or implicitly.

attribute.name: Action First-Party
attribute.description: How does the first party collect, track, or obtain user information?

value.name: Collect on website
value.description: The company/organization collects user information directly on the website.

value.name: Collect in mobile app
value.description: The company/organization has a mobile app and it collects user information through that platform.

value.name: Collect on mobile website
value.description: The company/organization has a mobile version of its website through which it collects user information. This value is only needed if the policy explicitly distinguishes between its normal and mobile websites.

value.name: Track user on other websites
value.description: The company/organization tracks its users’ activities when they visit other websites, typically without the user being aware of it.

value.name: Collect from user on other websites
value.description: This company/organization (the first party) has a widget or element on other websites, in which the user can explicitly provide data to the first party while being on the other website. For example, Facebook users can comment on news or other content on different websites and Facebook collects that data.

value.name: Receive from other parts of company/affiliates
value.description: The company/organization is part of a family of companies/organizations or has subsidiaries (e.g., physical store, other websites that belong to same company). It receives user information from those other units.

value.name: Receive from other service/third-party (unnamed)
value.description: The company/organization receives user information from an unnamed third-party (e.g., the policy just speaks of “data brokers” or "partners" in the abstract).

value.name: Receive from other service/third-party (named)
value.description: The company/organization acquires user information from a third party that is explicitly named (e.g., Facebook when the user signs in using Facebook account; or a specific "partner").

value.name: Other
value.description: The specified type of collection is not covered by the options above.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: The type of collection is not specified or unclear, e.g., “We collect your personal information” without further specification whether the collection occurs on a website, an app, offline, etc.

attribute.name: Identifiability
attribute.description: Use this optional attribute if it is explicitly stated whether the information or data practice is linked to the user's identity or if it is anonymous. Defaults to "not selected."

value.name: Identifiable
value.description: It is explicitly stated that the information/data practice is linked to the user's identity.

value.name: Aggregated or anonymized
value.description: The collected data is anonymized (e.g., link to user's identity is removed) or aggregated (e.g., merged with other users' information so that it is not possible to uniquely identify a single user).

value.name: Other
value.description: The practice makes an explicit statement about identifiability that is not covered by the options above.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: It’s not explicitly stated or unclear if the information/data practice is linked to the user's identity.

attribute.name: Personal Information Type
attribute.description: What category of information is collected or tracked by the company/organization?

value.name: Financial
value.description: Financial information, such as credit/debit card data, other payment information, credit scores, etc.

value.name: Health
value.description: Health Information, such as information about health conditions, prescriptions, medication, as well as health monitoring data, e.g., heart rate, step count, activity level, etc.

value.name: Contact
value.description: Contact Information, such as name, email address, phone number, street address, etc.

value.name: Location
value.description: Geo-location information (e.g., user's current location) regardless of granularity, i.e., could be exact location, ZIP code, city-level.

value.name: Demographic
value.description: Demographic Information, e.g., gender, age, occupation, education, etc.

value.name: Personal identifier
value.description: Identifiers that uniquely identify a person,e.g., SSN, driver's license number, etc.

value.name: User online activities
value.description: The user's online activities on the first party website/app or other websites/apps, e.g., pages visited, time spent on pages, general user behavior online, etc.

value.name: User profile
value.description: The user’s profile on the first-party website/app and its contents, e.g., data in user profile, data that user uploaded to website, user comments, user profile preferences, etc. This is common for websites/apps where users can create an account or profile, e.g., on twitter, youtube, Facebook, Amazon, etc.

value.name: Social media data
value.description: User profile and data from a social media website/app or other third party service to which the user gave the first party access, e.g., by connecting with Facebook, twitter, or other services. Exchanged data may include user profile, photos, comments, friends, etc.

value.name: IP address and device IDs
value.description: Permanent (e.g., device IDs, MAC address) or temporary (e.g., IP address) identifiers needed to establish a connection for the current browsing session.

value.name: Cookies and tracking elements
value.description: Identifiers locally stored on user's device by the company/organization or third-parties including cookies, beacons, or similar that are commonly used to uniquely identify users, but that are not essential to establish a connection with the user’s device or to provide a service.

value.name: Computer information
value.description: The type of operating system (OS) or web browser that the user uses, or similar computer or device information.

value.name: Survey data
value.description: Any data that is collected through surveys

value.name: Generic personal information
value.description: No specific type of information is mentioned, but the policy talks about “personal information” or “personal identifiable information” in general.

value.name: Other
value.description: A specific type of information not covered by the above categories.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: The type of information is not explicitly stated or unclear (e.g., refers to "information" very generically).

attribute.name: Purpose
attribute.description: What is the purpose of collecting or using user information?

value.name: Basic service/feature
value.description: Provide a service that the user explicitly requests and that is part of the website/app's basic service or functionality. Examples are watching a video, reading an article, making a purchase, creating an account, contacting the company, etc.

value.name: Additional service/feature
value.description: Provide a service that the user explicitly requests but that is not a necessary part of the website/app's basic service. Additional services/features may enhance user experience or add convenience but require additional data, e.g., social media integration, comments, blog participation, a store finder that needs location information, etc.

value.name: Advertising
value.description: To show ads that are either targeted to the specific user or not targeted.

value.name: Marketing
value.description: To contact the user to offer products,services, or other promotions (e.g., send marketing emails, calling or texting user with marketing messages). Marketing typically requires the use of contact information.

value.name: Analytics/Research
value.description: For understanding the website/app’s audience, improving the website/app, inform company strategy, or general research.

value.name: Personalization/Customization
value.description: For providing user with a personalized experience, e.g., by allowing to arrange how the website/app looks, based on the user’s preferences or language, etc.

value.name: Service Operation and Security
value.description: For website/app operation and security, enforcement of terms of service, fraud prevention, protecting users and property, etc.

value.name: Legal requirement
value.description: For compliance with legal obligations, e.g., regulations, government data requests, government retention requests, law enforcement requests in general, etc.

value.name: Merger/Acquisition
value.description: If company/organization merges or is acquired it transfers users' information to another company/organization.

value.name: Other
value.description: Other specific purpose not covered above.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: The purpose is not explicitly stated or is unclear.

attribute.name: User Type
attribute.description: Use this optional attribute if this practice applies specifically to users with an account or users without an account.

value.name: User without account
value.description: This data practice specifically applies to users that do not have an account or are not registered with the website or mobile app.

value.name: User with account
value.description: This data practice specifically applies to users with an account or who are registered with the website or mobile app.

value.name: Other
value.description: This data practice applies to a specific user type not covered by the options above.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: It is not specified whether this practice applies to users with or without account.

attribute.name: Choice Type
attribute.description: Use this optional attribute if user choices are explicitly offered for this practice. Defaults to “not selected.”

value.name: Dont use service/feature
value.description: Only option is not to use the feature or service. Only select this if explicitly stated in policy (i.e., don't interpret silence as "Don't use website or feature").

value.name: Opt-in
value.description: User must consent before data can be collected or used by first party.

value.name: Opt-out link
value.description: Link provided in privacy policy, on website, in mobile app, or in email, etc.

value.name: Opt-out via contacting company
value.description: Must contact company via email, phone, or postal mail to opt-out.

value.name: First-party privacy controls
value.description: Website/app provides user settings for privacy configuration.

value.name: Third-party privacy controls
value.description: Choices provided by a third party (e.g., privacy settings on social media site) or industry (e.g., AdChoices Opt-out).

value.name: Browser/device privacy controls
value.description: Policy suggests the use of browser or mobile device’s privacy settings, e.g., to block trackers or cookies, activate Do-Not-Track, disable location sharing, clear history, etc.

value.name: Other
value.description: Other specific user choice or control option not captured above.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: No user choices mentioned for this practice.

attribute.name: Choice Scope
attribute.description: Use this optional attribute to indicate the scope of user choices. In some cases, even if user choices are not clear or specific, this attribute can be selected. Defaults to “not selected.”

value.name: Collection
value.description: Choices apply to collection only.

value.name: Use
value.description: Choices apply to use only.

value.name: Both
value.description: Choices apply to both collection and use.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: No specific scope of choices is mentioned.

category.name: Third Party Sharing/Collection
category.description: Privacy practice describing data sharing with third parties or data collection by third parties. A third party is a company/organization other than the first party company/organization that owns the website or mobile app.

attribute.name: Third Party Entity
attribute.description: The third-party involved in the data practice.

value.name: Unnamed third party
value.description: The third party is not explicitly named, i.e., it is just generically referred to as "third-party," "partner," or similar.

value.name: Named third party
value.description: The third party is explicitly named (e.g. Facebook) or at least characterized (e.g., “advertising partner” or “data broker”).

value.name: Other part of company/affiliate
value.description: Data is made available to other parts of the company/organization, e.g., it is shared with other services, apps, or websites operated by the company, could also be data exchange between online and offline company units (e.g. physical stores).

value.name: Other users
value.description: The third-party involved are other users of the first party website or mobile app.

value.name: Public
value.description: User information is made public or can be obtained from public sources.

value.name: Other
value.description: Other specific third-party entity not covered above.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: The third-party entity is not specified. This is uncommon, "unnamed third-party" will likely be the right value instead.

attribute.name: Does/Does Not
attribute.description: Use this optional attribute to denote if the policy explicitly states that something is NOT done. Defaults to Does.

value.name: Does
value.description: The third party does engage in the described practice.

value.name: Does Not
value.description: The third party does not engage in the described practice.

attribute.name: Action Third Party
attribute.description: How does the third-party receive, collect, track, or see user information.

value.name: Receive/Shared with
value.description: The third party receives information from the first party. (i.e., the first party explicitly shares data with third-party)

value.name: Collect on first party website/app
value.description: The third party explicitly collects data from users on the first party website/app, e.g., by functionality on the website/app that allows users to directly provide information to the third party, such as social media sharing buttons or commenting forms.

value.name: Track on first party website/app
value.description: The third party implicitly collects data about users directly on the first party website/app, typically without the user being aware of it, e.g., by tracking users with cookies, beacons, third party ad libraries, or other functionality.

value.name: See
value.description: Third-party can see user information that is publicly available either on the website/app or somewhere else. Remember, a third-party can be another user of the website/app. The difference to “receive” is that the information is available but not explicitly given to a specific third party.

value.name: Other
value.description: How the third party collects or receives user information is specified in the policy but it is not covered by the options above.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: The type of collection is not specified or unclear, e.g., “Our outside partners collect your personal information” without further specification whether the collection occurs on a website, app, offline, etc.

attribute.name: Identifiability
attribute.description: Use this optional attribute if if it is explicitly stated whether the information or data practice is linked to the user's identity or if it is anonymous. Defaults to "not selected."

value.name: Identifiable
value.description: It is explicitly stated that the information/data practice is linked to the user's identity.

value.name: Aggregated or anonymized
value.description: The collected data is anonymized (e.g., link to user's identity is removed) or aggregated (e.g., merged with other users' information so that it is not possible to uniquely identify a single user).

value.name: Other
value.description: The policy makes an explicit statement about identifiability that is not covered by the options above.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: It is not explicitly stated or unclear if the information/data practice is linked to the user's identity.

attribute.name: Personal Information Type
attribute.description: What category of information is shared with, collected by or otherwise obtained by the third-party.

value.name: Financial
value.description: Financial information, e.g., credit/debit card data, other payment information, credit scores, etc.

value.name: Health
value.description: Health Information, such as information about health conditions, prescriptions, medication, as well as health monitoring data, e.g., heart rate, step count, activity level, etc.

value.name: Contact
value.description: Contact Information, e.g., name, email address, phone number, street address, etc.

value.name: Location
value.description: Geo-location information (e.g., user's current location) regardless of granularity, i.e., could be exact location, ZIP code, city-level.

value.name: Demographic
value.description: Demographic Information, e.g., gender, age, occupation, education, etc.

value.name: Personal identifier
value.description: Identifiers that uniquely identify a person,e.g., SSN, driver's license number, etc.

value.name: User online activities
value.description: The user’s online activities on the first party website/app or other websites/apps, e.g., pages visited, time spent on pages, general user behavior online, etc.

value.name: User Profile
value.description: The user’s profile on the first-party website/app and its contents, e.g., data in user profile, data that user uploaded to website/app, user comments, user profile preferences, etc. This is common for websites/apps where users can create an account or profile, e.g., on twitter, youtube, Facebook, Amazon, etc.

value.name: IP address and device IDs
value.description: Permanent (e.g., device IDs, MAC address) or temporary (e.g., IP address) identifiers of the user device (e.g., computer, mobile device, etc.) needed to establish a connection for the current browsing session.

value.name: Cookies and tracking elements
value.description: Identifiers locally stored on user's device by company/organization or third-parties including cookies, beacons, or similar that are commonly used to uniquely identify users, but that are not essential to establish a connection with the user’s device or to provide a service.

value.name: Computer information
value.description: The type of operating system (OS) or web browser that the user uses, or similar computer or device information.

value.name: Survey data
value.description: Any data that is collected through surveys.

value.name: Generic personal information
value.description: No specific type of information is mentioned, but the policy talks about “personal information” or “personal identifiable information” in general.

value.name: Other
value.description: A specific type of information not covered by the above categories.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: The type of information is not explicitly stated or unclear (e.g., refers to "information" very generically).

attribute.name: Purpose
attribute.description: What is the purpose of a third party receiving or collecting user information?

value.name: Basic service/feature
value.description: Provide a service that user explicitly requests and that is part of website/app's basic service or functionality. Examples are watching a video, reading an article, making a purchase, creating an account, contacting the company, etc.

value.name: Additional service/feature
value.description: Provide a service that the user explicitly requests but that is not a necessary part of the website/app's basic service. Additional services/features may enhance user experience or add convenience but require additional data or sharing with third parties, e.g., social media integration, comments, blog participation, a store finder that needs location information, etc.

value.name: Advertising
value.description: To show ads that are either targeted to the specific user or not targeted.

value.name: Marketing
value.description: To contact the user to offer products, services, or other promotions (e.g., send marketing emails, calling or texting user with marketing messages). Marketing typically requires the use of contact information.

value.name: Analytics/Research
value.description: For understanding the website/app’s audience, improving the website/app, inform company strategy, or general research.

value.name: Personalization/Customization
value.description: For providing user with a personalized experience, e.g., by allowing to arrange how the website/app looks, based on the user’s preferences or language, etc.

value.name: Service operation and security
value.description: For website/app operation and security, enforcement of terms of service, fraud prevention, protecting users and property, etc.

value.name: Legal requirement
value.description: For compliance with legal obligations, e.g., regulations, government data requests, government retention requests, law enforcement requests in general, etc.

value.name: Merger/Acquisition
value.description: If company/organization merges or is acquired it transfers users' information to another company/organization.

value.name: Other
value.description: Other specific purpose not covered above.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: The purpose is not explicitly stated or is unclear.

attribute.name: User Type
attribute.description: Use this optional attribute if this practice applies specifically to users with an account or users without an account.

value.name: User without account
value.description: This data practice specifically applies to users that do not have an account or are not registered with the website or mobile app.

value.name: User with account
value.description: This data practice specifically applies to users with an account or who are registered with the website or mobile app.

value.name: Other
value.description: This data practice applies to a specific user type not covered by the options above.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: It is not specified whether this practice applies to users with or without account.

attribute.name: Choice Type
attribute.description: Use this optional attribute if user choices are explicitly offered for this practice. Defaults to “not selected.”

value.name: Dont use service/feature
value.description: Only option is not to use the feature or service. Only select this if explicitly stated in policy (i.e., don't interpret silence as "Don't use website or feature").

value.name: Opt-in
value.description: User must consent before data can be shared with or collected/used by third party.

value.name: Opt-out link
value.description: Link provided in privacy policy, on website, in mobile app, or in email, etc.

value.name: Opt-out via contacting company
value.description: Must contact company/organization via email, phone, postal mail to opt-out.

value.name: First-party privacy controls
value.description: Website/app provides user settings for privacy configuration.

value.name: Third-party privacy controls
value.description: Choices provided by a third party (e.g., privacy settings on social media site) or industry (e.g., AdChoices Opt-out).

value.name: Browser/device privacy controls
value.description: Policy suggests the use of browser’s or mobile device’s privacy settings, e.g., to block trackers or cookies, activate Do-Not-Track, disable location sharing, clear history, etc.

value.name: Other
value.description: Other specific user choice or control option not captured above.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: No user choices mentioned for this practice.

attribute.name: Choice Scope
attribute.description: Use this optional attribute to indicate the scope of user choices. In some cases, even if user choices are not clear or specific, this attribute can be selected. Defaults to “not selected.”

value.name: Collection
value.description: Choices apply to collection by or sharing with third party only.

value.name: Use
value.description: Choices apply to use by third party only.

value.name: Both
value.description: Choices apply to both collection/sharing and use.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: No specific scope of choices is mentioned.

category.name: User Choice/Control
category.description: Practice that describes general choices and control options available to users.

attribute.name: Choice Type
attribute.description: The type of user choice or privacy control options available to users.

value.name: Dont use service/feature
value.description: Only option is not to use the feature or service. Only select this if explicitly stated in policy (i.e., don't interpret silence as "Don't use website or feature").

value.name: Opt-in
value.description: User must consent before data can be shared with or collected/used by third party.

value.name: Opt-out link
value.description: Link provided in privacy policy, on website, in mobile app, or in email, etc.

value.name: Opt-out via contacting company
value.description: Must contact company/organization via email, phone, postal mail to opt-out.

value.name: First-party privacy controls
value.description: Website/app provides user settings for privacy configuration.

value.name: Third-party privacy controls
value.description: Choices provided by a third party (e.g., privacy settings on social media site) or industry (e.g., AdChoices Opt-out).

value.name: Browser/device privacy controls
value.description: Policy suggests the use of browser’s or mobile device’s privacy settings, e.g., to block trackers or cookies, activate Do-Not-Track, disable location sharing, clear history, etc.

value.name: Other
value.description: Other specific user choice or control option not captured above.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: No user choices mentioned for this practice.

attribute.name: Choice Scope
attribute.description: What scope does the user choice or control apply to, i.e., first party collection/use or third party collection/use. Note that sometimes use of information can be limited, but the information is still collected from users.

value.name: First party collection
value.description: Choices apply to data collection by first party.

value.name: First party use
value.description: Choices apply to the use of information by first party.

value.name: Third party sharing/collection
value.description: Choices apply to data sharing with / collection by third party.

value.name: Third party use
value.description: Choices apply to the use of information by third party.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: No specific scope of choices is mentioned.

attribute.name: Personal Information Type
attribute.description: What category of information does the user choice apply to?

value.name: Financial
value.description: Financial information, such as credit/debit card data, other payment information, credit scores, etc.

value.name: Health
value.description: Health Information, such as information about health conditions, prescriptions, medication, as well as health monitoring data, e.g., heart rate, step count, activity level, etc.

value.name: Contact
value.description: Contact Information, such as name, email address, phone number, street address, etc.

value.name: Location
value.description: Geo-location information (e.g., user's current location) regardless of granularity, i.e., could be exact location, ZIP code, city-level.

value.name: Demographic
value.description: Demographic Information, e.g., gender, age, occupation, education, etc.

value.name: Personal identifier
value.description: Identifiers that uniquely identify a person,e.g., SSN, driver's license number, etc.

value.name: User online activities
value.description: The user's online activities on the first party website/app or other websites/apps, e.g., pages visited, time spent on pages, general user behavior online, etc.

value.name: User profile
value.description: The user’s profile on the first-party website/app and its contents, e.g., data in user profile, data that user uploaded to website, user comments, user profile preferences, etc. This is common for websites/apps where users can create an account or profile, e.g., on twitter, youtube, Facebook, Amazon, etc.

value.name: Social media data
value.description: User profile and data from a social media website/app or other third party service to which the user gave the first party access, e.g., by connecting with Facebook, twitter, or other services. Exchanged data may include user profile, photos, comments, friends, etc.

value.name: IP address and device IDs
value.description: Permanent (e.g., device IDs, MAC address) or temporary (e.g., IP address) identifiers needed to establish a connection for the current browsing session.

value.name: Cookies and tracking elements
value.description: Identifiers locally stored on user's device by company/organization or third-parties including cookies, beacons, or similar that are commonly used to uniquely identify users, but that are not essential to establish a connection with the user’s device or to provide a service.

value.name: Computer information
value.description: The type of operating system (OS) or web browser that the user uses, or similar computer or device information.

value.name: Survey data
value.description: Any data that is collected through surveys

value.name: Generic personal information
value.description: No specific type of information is mentioned, but the policy talks about “personal information” or “personal identifiable information” in general.

value.name: Other
value.description: A specific type of information not covered by the above categories.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: The type of information is not explicitly stated or unclear (e.g., refers to "information" very generically).

attribute.name: Purpose
attribute.description: What purpose/use of information does the user choice apply to?

value.name: Basic service/feature
value.description: Provide a service that the user explicitly requests and that is part of the website/app's basic service or functionality. Examples are watching a video, reading an article, making a purchase, creating an account, contacting the company/organization, etc.

value.name: Additional service/feature
value.description: Provide a service that the user explicitly requests but that is not a necessary part of the website/app's basic service. Additional services/features may enhance user experience or add convenience but require additional data, e.g., social media integration, comments, blog participation, a store finder that needs location information, etc.

value.name: Advertising
value.description: To show ads that are either targeted to the specific user or not targeted.

value.name: Marketing
value.description: To contact the user to offer products,services, or other promotions (e.g., send marketing emails, calling or texting user with marketing messages). Marketing typically requires the use of contact information.

value.name: Analytics/Research
value.description: For understanding the website/app’s audience, improving the website/app, inform company strategy, or general research.

value.name: Personalization/Customization
value.description: For providing user with a personalized experience, e.g., by allowing to arrange how the website/app looks, based on the user’s preferences or language, etc.

value.name: Service Operation and Security
value.description: For website/app operation and security, enforcement of terms of service, fraud prevention, protecting users and property, etc.

value.name: Legal requirement
value.description: For compliance with legal obligations, e.g., regulations, government data requests, government retention requests, law enforcement requests in general, etc.

value.name: Merger/Acquisition
value.description: If company/organization merges or is acquired it transfers users' information to another company/organization.

value.name: Other
value.description: Other specific purpose not covered above.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: The purpose is not explicitly stated or is unclear.

attribute.name: User Type
attribute.description: Use this optional attribute if this practice applies specifically to users with or without an account.

value.name: User without account
value.description: This data practice specifically applies to users that do not have an account or are not registered with the website or mobile app.

value.name: User with account
value.description: This data practice specifically applies to users with an account or who are registered with the website or mobile app.

value.name: Other
value.description: This data practice applies to a specific user type not covered by the options above.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: It is not specified whether this practice applies to users with or without account.

category.name: User Access, Edit and Deletion
category.description: Privacy practice that allows users to access, edit or delete the data that the company/organization has about them.

attribute.name: Access Type
attribute.description: Options offered for users to access, edit, delete information that the company/organization has about them.

value.name: None
value.description: Users cannot access, edit, or delete data. Only select this if explicitly stated that users don't have access, otherwise select "Unspecified."

value.name: View
value.description: Users can access their information, but not edit or delete it

value.name: Export
value.description: Users can export their information to other services or download it to own computer.

value.name: Edit information
value.description: User can modify or delete specific information

value.name: Deactivate account
value.description: User can deactivate account so that the user’s information is not visible to other users anymore, but the company/organization keeps all the data.

value.name: Delete account (partial)
value.description: User can delete account, but the company/organization may continue to keep some of the user’s data.

value.name: Delete account (full)
value.description: User can delete account and all of the user’s information is removed from company/organization’s servers/databases.

value.name: Other
value.description: An access, edit, or delete option not covered above.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: Access options are not mentioned or unclear.

attribute.name: Access Scope
attribute.description: If access is offered, what data does it apply to.

value.name: User account data
value.description: Information explicitly provided by the user, such as contact, demographic, and any other explicitly provided information that is part of the user’s profile/account. This includes user preferences and settings.

value.name: Transactional data
value.description: Purchases made, online activity, products watched, comments or questions submitted.

value.name: Profile data
value.description: Information that the company has learned about user, even if the user did not explicitly provided it

value.name: Other data about user
value.description: Other information that the company/organization has learned about the user, e.g., inferred preferences, data from other third parties, etc.

value.name: Other
value.description: A specific access scope is described that is not covered above.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: Access scope is not mentioned or unclear.

attribute.name: User Type
attribute.description: Use this optional attribute if this practice applies specifically to users with or without an account.

value.name: User without account
value.description: This data practice specifically applies to users that do not have an account or are not registered with the website or mobile app.

value.name: User with account
value.description: This data practice specifically applies to users with an account or who are registered with the website or mobile app.

value.name: Other
value.description: This data practice applies to a specific user type not covered by the options above.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: It is not specified whether this practice applies to users with or without account.

category.name: Data Retention
category.description: Privacy practice specifying the retention period for collected user information.

attribute.name: Retention Period
attribute.description: Description of the retention period, i.e., how long data is stored.

value.name: Indefinitely
value.description: Collected user information is retained indefinitely.

value.name: Limited
value.description: Data is deleted, anonymized, or aggregated at some point, but no specific retention period is stated, e.g., “only stored as long as needed to perform requested service” or “as required by legal obligations.”

value.name: Stated Period
value.description: Collected user information is deleted, anonymized or aggregated after a specific time period, e.g., “activity data is anonymized after 30 days.”

value.name: Other
value.description: A specific retention type not covered above.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: Retention period is not stated or unclear.

attribute.name: Retention Purpose
attribute.description: The purpose to which the retention practice applies (may be “unspecified”).

value.name: Perform service
value.description: Collected user information is only stored as long as it is needed to perform the requested service.

value.name: Legal requirement
value.description: Collected data is only stored as long as required for legal or law enforcement purposes.

value.name: Analytics/Research
value.description: For understanding the website/app’s audience, improving the website/app, inform company strategy, or general research.

value.name: Service operation and security
value.description: For website/app operation and security, enforcement of terms of service, fraud prevention, protecting users and property, etc.

value.name: Advertising
value.description: To show ads that are either targeted to the specific user or not targeted.

value.name: Marketing
value.description: To contact the user to offer products, services, or other promotions (e.g., send marketing emails, calling or texting user with marketing messages). Marketing typically requires the use of contact information.

value.name: Other
value.description: Other specific retention purpose not covered above.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: The retention purpose is not explicitly stated or is unclear.

attribute.name: Personal Information Type
attribute.description: The information type for which the retention period is specified (may be “unspecified”).

value.name: Financial
value.description: Financial information, such as credit/debit card data, other payment information, credit scores, etc.

value.name: Health
value.description: Health Information, such as information about health conditions, prescriptions, medication, as well as health monitoring data, e.g., heart rate, step count, activity level, etc.

value.name: Contact
value.description: Contact Information, such as name, email address, phone number, street address, etc.

value.name: Location
value.description: Geo-location information (e.g., user's current location) regardless of granularity, i.e., could be exact location, ZIP code, city-level.

value.name: Demographic
value.description: Demographic Information, e.g., gender, age, occupation, education, etc.

value.name: Personal identifier
value.description: Identifiers that uniquely identify a person,e.g., SSN, driver's license number, etc.

value.name: User online activities
value.description: The user's online activities on the first party website/app or other websites/apps, e.g., pages visited, time spent on pages, general user behavior online, etc.

value.name: User profile
value.description: The user’s profile on the first-party website/app and its contents, e.g., data in user profile, data that user uploaded to website, user comments, user profile preferences, etc. This is common for websites/apps where users can create an account or profile, e.g., on twitter, youtube, Facebook, Amazon, etc.

value.name: Social media data
value.description: User profile and data from a social media website/app or other third party service to which the user gave the first party access, e.g., by connecting with Facebook, twitter, or other services. Exchanged data may include user profile, photos, comments, friends, etc.

value.name: IP address and device IDs
value.description: Permanent (e.g., device IDs, MAC address) or temporary (e.g., IP address) identifiers needed to establish a connection for the current browsing session.

value.name: Cookies and tracking elements
value.description: Identifiers locally stored on user's device by website or third-parties including cookies, beacons, or similar that are commonly used to uniquely identify users, but that are not essential to establish a connection with the user’s device or to provide a service.

value.name: Computer information
value.description: The type of operating system (OS) or web browser that the user uses, or similar computer or device information.

value.name: Survey data
value.description: Any data that is collected through surveys

value.name: Generic personal information
value.description: No specific type of information is mentioned, but the policy talks about “personal information” or “personal identifiable information” in general.

value.name: Other
value.description: A specific type of information not covered by the above categories.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: The type of information is not explicitly stated or unclear (e.g., refers to "information" very generically).

category.name: Data Security
category.description: Practice that describes how users’ information is secured and protected, e.g., from confidentiality, integrity, or availability breaches. Common practices include the encryption of stored data and online communications.

attribute.name: Security Measure
attribute.description: Policy statements that describe the type of security that the website/app implements to protect users’ information.

value.name: Secure data transfer
value.description: Data transfer between user and website/app is encrypted, e.g., SSL, TLS, HTTPS.

value.name: Secure user authentication
value.description: User authentication, e.g., login to a user account, is encrypted/secured.

value.name: Secure data storage
value.description: Data is stored securely, e.g. in an encrypted format or database.

value.name: Data access limitation
value.description: Data is accessible to employees/third parties on a need-to-know basis.

value.name: Privacy training
value.description: The company/organization trains its employees/third parties in applicable privacy and security practices to protect user data.

value.name: Privacy review/audit
value.description: Privacy practices and security measures of the first party or third party are reviewed/audited by internal or external reviewers/auditors.

value.name: Privacy/Security program
value.description: The company/organization has a privacy or security program/organization in place addressing, for example, how to protect data against unauthorized access or privacy training for employees.

value.name: Generic
value.description: The policy makes generic security statements, e.g., “we protect your data” or “we use technology/encryption to protect your data.”

value.name: Other
value.description: A specific security measure not covered above.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: Security measures are not mentioned or unclear.

category.name: Policy Change
category.description: The company/organization’s practices concerning if and how users will be informed of changes to its privacy policy, including any choices offered to users.

attribute.name: Change Type
attribute.description: For what type of changes to the website/app’s policy are users notified.

value.name: Non-privacy relevant change
value.description: Minor change to the privacy policy that does not significantly affect data practices.

value.name: Privacy relevant change
value.description: A change to the privacy policy significantly impacting current data practices, e.g., use, collection, sharing, retention, etc.

value.name: In case of merger or acquisition
value.description: Users are notified if the policy changes as the result of a merger or acquisition.

value.name: Other
value.description: Other specific policy change type not covered above.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: It is not mentioned or unclear for what kind of policy changes users are notified.

attribute.name: Notification Type
attribute.description: How is the user notified when the privacy policy changes.

value.name: No notification
value.description: User is not notified of changes to the privacy policy.

value.name: General notice in privacy policy
value.description: The policy date is updated or information about the change is posted as part of the privacy policy site.

value.name: General notice on website
value.description: Users will be notified when visiting the main website, i.e., not only when looking at the privacy policy.

value.name: Personal notice
value.description: Users will be personally informed about a privacy policy change, e.g., via email, text message or when logging into their account.

value.name: Other
value.description: Users are notified in another specific way not covered above.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: How users are notified about policy changes is not mentioned or unclear.

attribute.name: User Choice
attribute.description: What choices/options are offered to the user when the policy changes.

value.name: None
value.description: The user has no options when the policy changes.

value.name: Opt-out
value.description: Users can decline the new policy within a certain time period (e.g., 30 days), e.g., by canceling their account, opting-out of new practices, etc.

value.name: Opt-in
value.description: User must agree before their data is collected/used/shared according to the new privacy policy.

value.name: User participation
value.description: Users can decide or influence policy change (e.g., the company/organization proposes a change and asks for users' opinions).

value.name: Other
value.description: Other specific user choice not covered above.

value.name: Unspecified
value.description: Choices regarding policy changes are not mentioned or unclear.

category.name: Do Not Track
category.description: Practices that explain if and how Do Not Track signals (DNT) for online tracking and advertising are honored.

attribute.name: Do Not Track policy
attribute.description: If and how Do-Not-Track signals (DNT) are honored.

value.name: Not mentioned
value.description: There is no statement concerning Do Not Track

value.name: Honored
value.description: The website/app reads and adheres to the user's DNT preference

value.name: Not honored
value.description: The website/app ignores DNT headers and the user’s DNT preference.

value.name: Mentioned, but unclear if honored
value.description: DNT headers are mentioned but it is unclear if the company/organization adheres to the user's DNT preference.

value.name: Other
value.description: The website/app handles DNT headers in a different way not covered above.

category.name: International and Specific Audiences
category.description: Specific audiences mentioned in the company/organization’s privacy policy, such as children or international users, for which the company/organization may provide special provisions.

attribute.name: Audience Type
attribute.description: Select which audience the policy segment refers to

value.name: Californians
value.description: How data from Californian users is treated, e.g., California privacy rights.

value.name: Europeans
value.description: How data from European users is treated, e.g., Safe Harbor provisions.

value.name: Citizens from other countries
value.description: Specific provisions for international audiences or citizens from countries other than US or Europe, e.g., international data transfer.

value.name: Children
value.description: How data from children is treated.

value.name: Other
value.description: Other specific audience group not mentioned above.

category.name: Other
category.description: Another aspect not covered in the other categories is discussed in the text segment.

attribute.name: Other Type
attribute.description: What other aspect not covered in the other categories is discussed in the text segment?

value.name: Introductory/Generic
value.description: It's a paragraph that introduces the policy, a section, or a group of practices, but does not mention a specific privacy/data practice. The paragraph makes generic statements, but does not describe specific privacy/data practices

value.name: Practice not covered
value.description: The paragraph describes a specific data practice, which is not covered by any of the other data practice categories.

value.name: Privacy contact information
value.description: The paragraph describes how to contact the company with questions, concerns, or complaints about the privacy policy.

value.name: Other
value.description: The paragraph does not fit any of the values above.
